question: Analyze the technology adoption trends of companies in the financial sector over the last five years.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies in the financial sector, including their relevant operational and financial details.
Gather records of technology service contracts that involve the identified financial companies over the last five years to understand their technology spending and partnerships.
Extract the technology stack used by the identified financial companies to analyze specific technologies adopted in their operational processes.
Review the social media presence of the identified financial companies to assess their engagement strategies and technology-related content over the past five years.
Investigate the strategic technology focus areas communicated by leadership within the financial companies to gain insight into their technology priorities and how it aligns with industry trends.
